headline: Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Beats Q3 Earnings Estimates
summary: Occidental (OXY) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +33.33% and -0.07%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Occidental Petroleum reports mixed Q3 results as revenue falls short of estimates
summary: Investing.com - Occidental Petroleum reported Monday mixed third-quarter results as earnings beat, but revenue miss estimates amid higher crude oil volumes and prices.

headline: Occidental Petroleum Profit Falls as Oil and Gas Sales Decline
summary: The oil-and-gas producer’s oil-and-gas segment, which makes up the bulk of its top line, recorded revenue of $5.4 billion, down from $5.7 billion a year ago

headline: Occidental: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: HOUSTON (AP) — Occidental Petroleum Corp. OXY) on Monday reported third-quarter earnings of $830 million. The Houston-based company said it had profit of 65 cents per share.

headline: Occidental Announces Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: HOUSTON, Nov. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Occidental (NYSE: OXY) today announced its third quarter 2025 financial results. The earnings release and accompanying financial schedules can be accessed via the Investor Relations section of the company’s website at oxy.com. The earnings release is also available on the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s website at sec.gov. The company will hold a conference call to discuss the results on Tuesday, November 11, 2025, at 1 p.m. Eastern/12 p.m. Ce

headline: Occidental Petroleum (OXY): Evaluating Valuation After $9.7B OxyChem Sale and Continued Shareholder Payouts
summary: Occidental Petroleum is making headlines with its latest moves. The company has declared a regular $0.24 per share quarterly dividend, completed a $9.7 billion OxyChem sale to trim debt, and continues to post resilient earnings. See our latest analysis for Occidental Petroleum. After a tough year for Occidental Petroleum, ongoing debt reduction and a consistent dividend have done little to lift shares, with the 1-year share price return down more than 17%. While recent moves like the OxyChem...

headline: Option Volatility and Earnings Report for November 10 - 14
